entry.tran: 剃光头的年轻人;(通常指有暴力行为和攻击性的)光头仔
entry.def: A skinhead is a young person whose hair is shaved or cut very short. Skinheads are usually regarded as violent and aggressive.

means.word_mean: 1. a young person who belongs to a British or American group that shave their heads and gather at rock concerts or engage in white supremacist demonstrations
